responseText: NSLOCTEXT("[70199B914E7E03A9706A1499CF20B1FD]", "D1318C6B491B475B0970DCB826AA0ACF", "Ah, yes. Have you heard of it? The Scholars Academy of Verra is an extension of the Sanctus Academy, working diligently to uncover the mysteries of Verra\'s past. The scholars believe in gaining great power through ancient arcane knowledge and researching the Essence. While I\'m not a member of the academy, I attempt to assist them in their endeavors by reconnecting with the gods for their divine intentions and guidance.")
name: DialogueResponse_6064631601429348356
